p: Concerning herbal medicine, the obtained results have revealed the use of 113 medicinal plant species, belonging to 104 genera and 53 families, for cancer treatment ( Table 2). The reported species were both gymnosperms (4 species, 4%) and angiosperms (109 species, 96%) including both monocotyledonous (12 species, 11%) and dicotyledonous (101 species, 89%) groups. Most of these medicinal plants are herbs (60%) while trees and shrubs represent 20% each.
